meanings.definition: A relish made from chopped pickled vegetables and spices.
meanings.sent1: I added a dollop of piccalillis to my hot dog for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The picnic basket was filled with sandwiches topped with piccalillis.
meanings.sent3: The piccalillis danced on my taste buds, making the meal more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of piccalillis, adding a touch of brightness to the room.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the piccalillis made it a feast for the eyes as well as the palate.

meanings.definition: A type of condiment typically used on sandwiches or as a side dish.
meanings.sent1: The deli offered a variety of sandwiches with piccalillis on the side.
meanings.sent2: She always adds a spoonful of piccalillis to her burger for an extra kick.
meanings.sent3: The piccalillis decided to take a break from sandwiches and explore the world of salads.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the air was like a jar of piccalillis being opened, releasing a burst of energy.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the piccalillis filled the room, tempting everyone to try a taste.
